metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13846 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in Bento4 1.5.1-624. AP4_Mpeg2TsVideoSampleStream::WriteSample in Core/Ap4Mpeg2Ts.cpp has a heap-based buffer over-read after a call from Mp42Ts.cpp, a related issue to CVE-2018-14532.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
